name: Jeopardy
description:
A Figma Powered Jeopardy Template!


Customize your own game of Jeopardy in Google Sheets and then sync it to this template to host a live remote game of Jeopardy. You'll need a host and a score/board keeper, along with 4 contestants.


Instructions are in the How to Use page, but here is a quick summary:

  1. Fill out your categories, questions, and answers in a google sheet by making a copy of the question template. (further instructions on specifics are available in the figma template)
  2. Install the Google Sheets Sync Plugin and fetch & sync the content from your sheet to the main game board page. (Specific details in the Google Sheet Sync Page of the figma template)
  3. One person hosts on a video session, another will keep score and update the board. Four players can play!
  4. For buzzers, use something like buzzin.live or cosmobuzzer.
